sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT empid, passwd, phone, email, to_char(hiredate,'yyyy/mm/dd') hiredate, ename||'님' ename, decode(section,'Y','[시스템관리자]','N','회원') section FROM emp WHERE empid IS NOT NULL
and ( empid LIKE '%$ktext$%' OR ename LIKE '%$ktext$%' OR phone LIKE '%$ktext$%' OR section LIKE '%$ktext$%' )
ORDER BY hiredate DESC) a )b
sqlMap.update: UPDATE emp SET section = 'Y' WHERE empid = #empid#
UPDATE emp SET section = 'N' WHERE empid = #empid#
